notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: A.E., A.E.P., L.V., D.B., D.H., V.A.T. and I.O. conceived and designed the structure of the manuscript, A.E., A.E.P., L.V., D.B., D.H., A.-M.G. and V.A.T. contributed to the phytochemical analysis and pharmacological protocols, A.E., A.E.P. and I.O. critically reviewed the manuscript. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
